channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:20 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 09:20 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:54 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
